**This complainant already has a signature on file with us.
Below, please find the original complaint:

ATTN: Google, Inc. 

Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA, [private], USA
Fax: [private]

FROM:[private]
Travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. 

[private]
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private], P.R.C.
Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]
E-mail: [private]@gmail.com


SUBJ: Copyright infringement 
DATE: September 28, 2007

Dear Google, Inc. 

1. I, the webmaster of www.travelchinaguide.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website. 


The offender is www.tibettravel.org. They copied 22 pages of contents and 2 images from our website without our permission. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the infringing pages and images from your search result. 


2. 1) Hereunder is the detailed information on the pages they have copied from our website: 

(1)Search Query “Thonglin monastery Tibet Travel Service tibettravel”  
Our Copyrighted Page: 

http://web.archive.org/web/20020218124515/http://travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/ngari/tholing.htm   (our February 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 

http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/20063241408-1.Html
 
(2)Search Query “The Guge Kingdom was founded in about the tenth century tibettravel”  (see ‘More results from www.tibettravel.org’)
Our Copyrighted Page: 

http://web.archive.org/web/20020815111926/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/ngari/guge_tomb.htm
  (our August 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/200632918257-1.html

(3)Search Query “Mt. Kailash and Lake Manasarova tibettravel”

Our Copyrighted Page: 
http://web.archive.org/web/20021203193130/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/ngari/manasarova.htm
   (our December 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/200632918531-1.html

(4) Search Query “Sera Monastery tibettravel” 

Our Copyrighted Page: 
http://web.archive.org/web/20020808135711/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/sera.htm
   (our August 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/200651014015-1.html

(5) Search Query “Yangpachen tibettravel”  

Our Copyrighted Page: 
http://web.archive.org/web/20031005210734/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/yabajing.htm
   (our October 2003 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/20065101448-1.html

(6) Search Query “Potala Palace tibettravel”  

Our Copyrighted Page: 
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/potala.htm

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/potala_2.htm
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/200651013590-1.html
   (They combined our two pages into one.)

(7) Search Query “Chakpori Hill (Yao Wang Shan) tibettravel” 
Our Copyrighted Page: 

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/chakpori-hill.htm
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/200651014526-1.html


(8) Search Query “About Jokhang Temple tibettravel” 
Our Copyrighted Page: 
http://web.archive.org/web/20020808103631/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/jokhang.htm
    (our August 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/200652016209-1.html
 
(9) Search Query “Drepung monastery tibettravel” 

Our Copyrighted Page: 
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/drepung.htm 
Infringing Web Page: 

http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2006324123317-1.html    (Their content from second paragraph on copied our entire content.)

(10) Search Query “Nietang Buddha tibettravel”
Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/nietang-buddha.htm
Infringing Web Page: 

http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2006329142111-1.html

(11) Search Query “The Tibet Museum is located in the southeast tibettravel”   (see ‘More results from www.tibettravel.org’ )
Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/tibet-museum.htm
Infringing Web Page: 

http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2006329142531-1.html

(12) Search Query “Norbulingka (the Summer Palace) tibettravel”  (see ‘More results from www.tibettravel.org’ )
Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20020808114241/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/norbulingka.htm
  (our August 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2006510135423-1.html

(13) Search Query “Tashilhunpo Monastery tibettravel”

Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/shigatse/tashilhunpo.htm
Infringing Web Page: 

http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/200632915478-1.html

(14) Search Query “Sakya Monastery tibettravel”  (see ‘More results from 
www.tibettravel.org’)
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020808140058/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/shigatse/sakya_monastery.htm
   (our August 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2006327124738-1.html

(15) Search Query “Shalu Monastery tibettravel”

Our Copyrighted Page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020808140701/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/shigatse/salu_monastery.htm
   (our August 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2006327125333-1.html

(16) Search Query “Zhangmu Town tibettravel”

Our Copyrighted Page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20010620062054/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/zhangmu/zhangmu.htm
  (our June 2001 version)
http://web.archive.org/web/20021218191800/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/zhangmu/zhangmu.htmn
   (our December 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2006327143347-1.html  (Content of their first two paragraphs copied the first page above while the rest content copied our second page above.)


(17) Search Query “Dzong Fortress tibettravel”
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/gyangtse/fort.htm

Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/2006329152838-1.html

(18) Search Query “Palkhor Monastery tibettravel”

Our Copyrighted Page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20021203165943/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/gyangtse/palcho_monastery.htm
  (our December 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2006329154050-1.html

(19) Search Query “Hospitals in Tibet tibettravel”

Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/essential/tibet/hospitals.htm
Infringing Web Page: 

http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/200742311289-1.Html

(20) Search Query “In Tibet, only US dollars can be accepted tibettravel org”
Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/essential/tibet/money.htm
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/200742311334-1.Html

(Their second paragraph copied our entire content.)

(21) Search Query “Yunnan Hwy to Tibet Scenery tibettravel”  
Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/yunnan/kunming/stone_forest.htm
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/yunnan/dali/erhai_lake.htm

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/yunnan/lijiang/tiger.htm
Infringing Web Page: 

http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2007427111723-1.Html
(Their first, third and fourth paragraphs of Kunming Stone forest copied the first, third and ninth paragraphs of our first page above; their content of Dali Erhai Lake copied the first two paragraphs of our second page above; content of their Tiger Leaping Gorges copied the third page above by deleting the last two paragraphs.)


(22) Search Query “Sakya Monastery Tibet Travel Service,Tibet Tour” 
Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20020808140058/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/shigatse/sakya_monastery.htm   (our August 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 

http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2007428103056-1.html

2) Hereunder are the 2 images they have copied from our website, you may find that they even didn’t erase our watermark when copying them: 


(1) Our Copyrighted Image: 
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/images/photogallery/0032000/sera%20lhasa%2010031517tm.jpg

Infringing Image: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Upload/newsimg/200651014022580.jpg
Infringing Image on Google: 

http://images.google.com/images?svnum=10&um=1&hl=en&newwindow=1&q=Sera+Monastery+tibettravel&btnG=Search+Images


(2) Our Copyrighted Image: 
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/images/photogallery/0031500/potala%2010031419tm.jpg

Infringing Image: 
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Upload/newsimg/200651013598621.jpg
Infringing Image on Google:

http://images.google.com/images?svnum=10&um=1&hl=en&newwindow=1&q=Potala+palace+tibettravel


3. My contact information:
  [private]
  [private]@gmail.com
www.travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.

[private]
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi,[private], P.R.C.

4. The contact info of the copyright offender www.tibettravel.org is:

   Email: [private]@hotmail.com 
Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.


6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


Thank you very much!

Yours sincerely,
[private]

Ps.: According to your instruction, all our copyright complaint can be sent to you only via email. Please refer to our faxed document to you on July 6th, 2007.
